original_title: S. Thomas’ College 104 for 4 after 30 overs
original_body_lines: St. Thomas College staged a recovery of sorts, moving onto  104 for 4 after 30 overs in the 46th Mustang's Trophy encounter against Royal College being played at the SSC grounds today.
Unbeaten at the crease were Senadhi Bulankulame on 40 and Akash Fernando on 12.
The pair came together in the 22nd over, when Mahith Perera was brilliantly called at fine leg for 28.
